name: Dash To The Past
description:

Not 100% done, but a cool testing of a concept early in the year.

Overview:

Platforming game, goal is to make it to the exit, avoiding enemies and obstacles like spikes.

Controls:

WASD to move  (W to Jump) 

Spacebar for boosted jump
